alert.note: Alert for Broward; Palm Beach (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 13 at 3:18PM EDT until April 13 at 3:45PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: The National Weather Service in Miami has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Broward County in southeastern Florida... South central Palm Beach County in southeastern Florida... * Until 345 PM EDT. * At 318 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles north of Intersection Alligator Alley And Miami Canal, or 18 miles west of Sunrise, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Tamarac, Mile Marker 30 On Alligator Alley, Intersection Alligator Alley And Miami Canal and Loxahatchee NWR. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
